review: Exemplary explanation, compassion for patients and family , builds the patients confidence , ********* ** *** ******* *** apt approach,  would always recommend to other patients. Find him honest to his profession .

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
He is very cooperative and very kind. He is not playing with patient like giving you medicine come after a week or something.
He is very straight and inform the patient relative or guardian that what is real matter and what will the profit for patient.
I am very thankful to him and respecting his advice.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,
review:
I have been facing longer waiting time issue despite taking the first appointment every-time. The doctor is late (sometimes) which is more than an hour. Many times without any information, other patients are taken in between which is not correct for me and my senior citizen dad or any patient. Please take a note of all this and allow patients is sequence and STOP taking random
Patients in between and reduce the wait time. This is not how it should be done

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Sensitive towards patients concerns. If required, consults on whatsapp. Good contacts for medicines.
